timeline.message: Added the research to language files.

Some code improvements.

(at least that's what was meant to be done)

timeline.bodyText: Why exactly is this set to null afterwards?
timeline.author: svr333

replies.bodyText:
Why exactly is this set to null afterwards?

So that we don't bother java gc with this.
replies.author: LinoxGH

timeline.bodyText: This says "Cargo Connector" in the lore...
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText: This line can be removed, it really doesn't have much use here
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,12 +16,15 @@
  * {@link Research} on startup.
  * 
  * @author TheBusyBiscuit
+ * @author Every Slimefun4 Contributor (at least those who added an item...)

timeline.bodyText: This variable assignment is completely unnecessary.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,12 +16,15 @@
  * {@link Research} on startup.
  * 
  * @author TheBusyBiscuit
+ * @author Every Slimefun4 Contributor (at least those who added an item...)
  * 
  * @see Research
+ * @see SlimefunItems
  *
  */
 public final class ResearchSetup {
 
+    private static SlimefunPlugin plugin = null;

timeline.bodyText:
Still, unnecessary. If you really wanna validate the input, add the plugin as a method parameter and do Validate.notNull() but not this.
I think using SlimefunPlugin.instance() like before was just fine too.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: I just thought that getting using a field would be more light-weight than running the method over 250 times.
replies.author: LinoxGH

timeline.bodyText: Yeah this will definitely need a proper texture first.
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: I'd love to only if I knew how to do it... Well at least without stealing someone's texture and still keeping my account's skin.
replies.author: LinoxGH

timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

timeline.bodyText:
Only thing missing is changing the texture here, I think you created one and posted it somewhere?
Just figured I'd review the changes and bump this since you requested a review a couple of days ago
timeline.author: Sfiguz7

replies.bodyText:
Only thing missing is changing the texture here, I think you created one and posted it somewhere?
Just figured I'd review the changes and bump this since you requested a review a couple of days ago

Yeah the texture is ready. I'll add it to the code and to mojand database soon.
replies.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText: Blame @J3fftw1 his tutorial gave this result.
replies.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText: Dont tag me also you could have used the shorter hash
replies.author: J3fftw1

replies.bodyText:
You need the hex texture id though, not the base64 json properties.
Simply decode this base64 mess, copy the texture url and snip off the domain. Then you get the hex id.
For the future I would recommend you to just use a tool like https://minecraft-heads.com/custom-heads/heads-generator
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: So I need a base64 of https://textures.minecraft.net/texture/1085e098756b995b00241644089c55a8f9acde35b9a37785d5e057a923613b ?
replies.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText:
No you just need the hex, the last part of this url...
10853...613b
replies.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText: @J3fftw1 btw this is another reason to not use that tutorial.
replies.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText: Okay idc if you cant use it and stop tagging me
replies.author: J3fftw1

timeline.message:
Update HeadTexture.java

I guess this is correct now.

timeline.bodyText:
ugh, I didn't even really see the recipe. That's a lot of CARBON...
How about this?
CWC
WRW
CWC

C = Carbon
W = Copper WIRE
R = Redstone block
timeline.author: TheBusyBiscuit

replies.bodyText:
how about 4 carbon (empty corners)?
And honestly I dont think many people would make this cuz you can just put another capacitator there - makes it less clustered overall
replies.author: svr333

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/io/github/thebusybiscuit/slimefun4/implementation/setup/SlimefunItemSetup.java b/src/main/java/io/github/thebusybiscuit/slimefun4/implementation/setup/SlimefunItemSetup.java
index 260bee75b..f12e375f7 100644
--- a/src/main/java/io/github/thebusybiscuit/slimefun4/implementation/setup/SlimefunItemSetup.java
+++ b/src/main/java/io/github/thebusybiscuit/slimefun4/implementation/setup/SlimefunItemSetup.java

@@ -1506,7 +1506,7 @@ public final class SlimefunItemSetup {
         .register(plugin);
 
         new EnergyConnector(categories.electricity, SlimefunItems.ENERGY_CONNECTOR, RecipeType.ENHANCED_CRAFTING_TABLE,
-        new ItemStack[] {SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.COPPER_INGOT, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.CARBON},
+        new ItemStack[] {SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.COPPER_WIRE, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.COPPER_WIRE, new ItemStack(Material.REDSTONE_BLOCK), SlimefunItems.COPPER_WIRE, SlimefunItems.CARBON, SlimefunItems.COPPER_WIRE, SlimefunItems.CARBON},
         new SlimefunItemStack(SlimefunItems.ENERGY_CONNECTOR, 8))
         .register(plugin);
